Title: Arkema switches R134a production to 1233zd
Summary: USA: Arkema has completed the transition of its R134a refrigerant facility in Calvert City, Kentucky, to produce the new HFO 1233zd.

Title: R44A to be sold in North America under Johnsen’s brand
Summary: USA: Orbia’s Klea Edge R444A refrigerant replacement for R1234yf in automotive air-conditioning will be marketed in North America under the Technical Chemical Company’s Johnsen’s brand…
